account.descriptionLink:
DHC Treasury is holding 1,440.02 DUST â‰ˆ$3,320 All from member donations (5 $Dust per month) or the proceeds of DHC NFT (over on hel.io).

$Dust is quickly gaining momentum as DeGods draw closer to March. We could see a new ATH over $3 maybe even pushing to $4.

This proposal is to vote on the ability to liquidate our treasury holding between $3 and $4 and possibly:

a. buy into Sol b. sit on USDC to use for IRL events c. sit on USDC to buy $Dust BACK when it drops to around $2.

As $SHOEY holders, you are entitled to vote on this proposal as FOR or AGAINST the idea. This vote will close in 72hrs.
account.name: Sell Treasury $Dust
